alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Niagara; Northern Erie; Southern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 02 at 9:23PM EST until February 04 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 13 inches tonight through Friday morning. * WHERE...Niagara, Erie, Chautauqua, and Cattaraugus counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect 1 to 3 inches accumulation by the Thursday morning commute. Most of the snow accumulation will be Thursday afternoon through Thursday night. Additional minor accumulations are possible Friday.
info.instruction: Widespread accumulating snow will create dangerous travel conditions. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.

area.areaDesc: Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Niagara; Northern Erie; Southern Erie
